mean_cn: v.隔离；使隔离；  n.检疫期
mean_en: to keep (a person or animal) away from others to prevent a disease from spreading :to put or keep (a person or animal) in quarantine
sentence: The zombies have been quarantined in order to keep people safe.
sentence_trans: 丧尸已经被隔离以确保人类的安全。
word_etyma: quarant检疫 + ine表示抽象名词 → quarantine隔离检查
